name: base-alpha
description: A starter repo loaded with my favorite tools

scripts.uglify: mkdir -p build/js && uglifyjs src/js/*.js -m -o build/js/app.js && uglifyjs src/js/*.js -m -c -o build/js/app.min.js
scripts.build:scss: npm run clean:scss && npm run scss && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.build:pug: npm run clean:pug && npm run pug
scripts.build:all: npm run img && npm run build:scss && npm run build:pug && npm run uglify
scripts.watch:all: parallelshell 'npm run serve' 'npm run build:all' 'npm run watch:scss' 'npm run watch:pug' 'npm run watch:js'

author: Corey Poff <cpoff@poffclan.com>
